text: Yɛlɛmali be farikolo dilan na yɛlɛmali kura farakan, ani sugandili b'a bɔ kɛnɛkantaw yɛlɛmali kulu cɛla.
translated_text:
Bamanankan: Tiriki kɛrɛ saba lamununa ni kɔgɔji ye: Kɔgɔji Eze tilebin fɛ, Kɔgɔjinfin kɔgɔdugu fɛ ni Kɔgɔji Mediteranɛn worodugu fɛ. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Bamanankan: Kɛlɛ in daminɛ la u tun be taama fanba kɛ kɔkɔji sanfɛ,  nka tuma minna jateminɛn-mansin yiriwala ka jaw jɛ jijukɔrɔkurunw jagoyala ka don jijukɔrɔ walasa k'u yeli bali. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Bamanankan: Yɛlɛmali be farikolo dilan na yɛlɛmali kura farakan, ani sugandili b'a bɔ kɛnɛkantaw yɛlɛmali kulu cɛla. 
English:liyɛnli yɛlɛmali kura farakan, ani sugandili b'a bɔ kɛnɛkantaw yɛlɛmali kulu cɛla.
clean_output: liyɛnli yɛlɛmali kura farakan, ani sugandili b'a bɔ kɛnɛkantaw yɛlɛmali kulu cɛla.

text: DɔnnikƐlaw ko ko nin datanfƐn faarikansi tun ɲƐ  ye worojiima de ye a kan ani ɲƐ  ladibilen walima ɲƐ  karotenoyide a kɔrɔla yanfa.

Bamanankan: Tiriki kɛrɛ saba lamununa ni kɔgɔji ye: Kɔgɔji Eze tilebin fɛ, Kɔgɔjinfin kɔgɔdugu fɛ ni Kɔgɔji Mediteranɛn worodugu fɛ. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Bamanankan: Kɛlɛ in daminɛ la u tun be taama fanba kɛ kɔkɔji sanfɛ,  nka tuma minna jateminɛn-mansin yiriwala ka jaw jɛ jijukɔrɔkurunw jagoyala ka don jijukɔrɔ walasa k'u yeli bali.

text: Mabu ya United States Geological Survey yonanirie gũtirĩ ithingithia thĩinĩ wa Iceland wiki ĩ mwe mbere.
translated_text:
Bamanankan: Tiriki kɛrɛ saba lamununa ni kɔgɔji ye: Kɔgɔji Eze tilebin fɛ, Kɔgɔjinfin kɔgɔdugu fɛ ni Kɔgɔji Mediteranɛn worodugu fɛ. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Bamanankan: Kɛlɛ in daminɛ la u tun be taama fanba kɛ kɔkɔji sanfɛ,  nka tuma minna jateminɛn-mansin yiriwala ka jaw jɛ jijukɔrɔkurunw jagoyala ka don jijukɔrɔ walasa k'u yeli bali. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Bamanankan: Mabu ya United States Geological Survey yonanirie gũtirĩ ithingithia thĩinĩ wa Iceland wiki ĩ mwe mbere. 
English:ũrĩa ũrathiĩ Iceland, United States Geological Survey ĩkĩonania gũtirĩ ithingithia thĩinĩ wa Iceland wiki ĩ mwe mbere.
clean_output: ũrĩa ũrathiĩ Iceland, United States Geological Survey ĩkĩonania gũtirĩ ithingithia thĩinĩ wa Iceland wiki ĩ mwe mbere.

text: Kuluwo in bɛ a kelenna, min bɛ kuluw cɛman kelen sanfɛ Makan kaɲɛka la.
translated_text:
Bamanankan: Tiriki kɛrɛ saba lamununa ni kɔgɔji ye: Kɔgɔji Eze tilebin fɛ, Kɔgɔjinfin kɔgɔdugu fɛ ni Kɔgɔji Mediteranɛn worodugu fɛ. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Bamanankan: Kɛlɛ in daminɛ la u tun be taama fanba kɛ kɔkɔji sanfɛ,  nka tuma minna jateminɛn-mansin yiriwala ka jaw jɛ jijukɔrɔkurunw jagoyala ka don jijukɔrɔ walasa k'u yeli bali. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Bamanankan:  Kuluwo in bɛ a kelenna, min bɛ kuluw cɛman kelen sanfɛ Makan kaɲɛka la. 
English:: The Turkish army is composed of three army corps: the Army of the Aegean, the Army of the Black Sea and the Army of the Mediterranean.
clean_output: : The Turkish army is composed of three army corps: the Army of the Aegean, the Army of the Black Sea and the Army of the Mediterranean.
